Text: YOU ARE THE MAN.... I have been looking for it all day. Thank you

Slick got some problems with the captureing and editing of his version, hopefully it will be available later.

His own words:

Sorry I was not home last night. When I got home I set up the computer to record it off the dvr and went to bed. I woke up 3 hours later to set up editing. When I attempted to open the video file in my usual editor it would not open. It said the file was corrupted. So I set everything up to record again but this time in a different format to hopefully fix the problem. 3 hours later when I tried the new file it would not work either. So this gave me the problem of either record it for a 3rd time and probably fail or try to edit one of the videos I have with a different editor. I had to research and find a different editor. These live races are tough on my computer I guess. It sucks to troubleshoot the process because recording takes 3 hours and the compression process takes about 5 hours. So right now I have the video being running in the new editor. It will be complete in 4.5 hours and I hope it is correct. I tried the editor on a 1 min video but it might act differently on a 2 hour and 15 min video. If there is a problem I will give an on here. 

The new editor I used had a major audio/video sync issue. Plus it lied to me about the quality. It looks good but is over 6GB in size. I will try to have the race up when I can but no guarantees when that might be. I am going to try to record it in 1 hour pieces and see if it saves them properly. I love the 3 hour live races but they are hard to record, edit and compress.
Slicknick: Hope you solve the problems. Yours are the best uploads. Really appreciate it.
Thanks for the upload, your time and effort is much appreciated here in uk!
Thanks for posting and thanks to the creator.
